job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and select appropriate Generative AI models based on business needs, ensuring alignment with use case requirements.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly addresses understanding business needs and aligning technical solutions (model selection) with those needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Partner with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, cloud architects, and business analysts, to align AI/ML solutions with business objectives.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with business stakeholders to ensure AI solutions meet business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage Azure ML,OpenAI APIs, and other Generative AI technologies based on a given design.
job_tasks.justification: This involves using and working with generative AI technologies, which falls under the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement best practices for model development, training, and deployment pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions development and training of models, core components of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage Azure AI model catalog (Microsoft, OpenAI, Mistral, Meta, etc) APIs to implement conversational AI, document summarization, image generation, or other innovative use cases.
job_tasks.justification: This describes building specific GenAI applications like conversational AI and image generation, which are model-based tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore advancements in AI/ML technologies, recommending tools, frameworks, and practices to enhance the organization's AI capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding and potentially adapting new modeling techniques and technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate Generative AI solutions with enterprise applications, APIs, and data sources.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building software integrations for GenAI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Create and deploy pipelines for model training, evaluation, and monitoring inAzure ML.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the operational aspects of deploying and monitoring models, aligning with MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize model performance for latency, scalability, and accuracy, ensuring compliance with regulatory and organizational standards.
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing for performance metrics like latency and scalability, and ensuring compliance are key MLOps responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: Partner with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, cloud architects, and business analysts, to align AI/ML solutions with business objectives.
Communicate complex (Gen) AI concepts to non-technical stakeholders, fostering a culture of innovation and understanding
Optimize model performance for latency, scalability, and accuracy, ensuring compliance with regulatory and organizational standards.
Explore advancements in AI/ML technologies, recommending tools, frameworks, and practices to enhance the organization's AI capabilities.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Generative AI models (LLMs, diffusion models) and integrating them into applications. This includes building RAG-like systems (conversational AI, document summarization) and optimizing their performance, directly aligning with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer.
